title: My Husband Pays for Sex
itunes:title: My Husband Pays for Sex
description:
Dear Shirley and Steve, I am 45 and my husband is 46. We've been married for almost 18 years and have four children. Sex between us was really good and often. My husband wanted sex any time he saw me. I thought it was borderline neurotic, but my ego and my husband made me…
